text: Splosion Man (originally Explosion Man) is a 2009 platform videogame developed by Beard, Inc and Twisted Pixel Games for the Xbox 360 arcade system. In 2011 a sequel was released: Ms.Splosion Man, equally for Xbox 360 Arcade System. == Plot == The game tells the story of 'Splosion Man, being able to explode, who must defeat three difficult bosses. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2009 video games Category:Action video games Category:Indie video games Category:Microsoft video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Side-scrolling platform games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox 360-only games Category:Xbox 360 Live Arcade games
